title: Shipping & Delivery Policy
description: Maive provides only digital products and services. As such, there is no physical shipping involved.

list.title: Delivery Method
list.conclusion: All digital items will be delivered via email, in-app access, or direct download links upon successful payment.

items.content: Standard digital products: Instant or within 15 minutes of payment.
Customized services: As per timeline agreed during order placement (usually within 1â€“3 business days).

list.title: Non-Receipt
list.conclusion: If you do not receive your item within the expected time, please check your spam folder. If the issue persists, contact us at themaive.in@gmail.com.

list.title: No Physical Shipping
list.conclusion: Maive does not ship any physical goods.

list.title: Contact
list.conclusion: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at: themaive.in@gmail.com

conclusion: By using our platform, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
